answers.answer: My cousin and I are two weeks apart. She was measuring way far ahead until week 37 until it just evened out for her. She had no concerns about it.

I was told day at my appointment baby was measuring 32 weeks & I'm only 29 weeks. He's been right on track all along. I took my 1hr glucose test y day & failed it so I got to take the 3hr one. My DR didn't seem worried about his size.
I had the 3hr glucose test and all was absolutely grand, that's why they are sending me for another scan as she was very shocked at how big he had jumped up xxx

I was told at my ultrasound at the beginning of the month that our little baby boy was measuring 1 week and 2 days ahead as well. The tech didn't seem worried but I see my midwife at the beginning of February but when I talked to her Thursday she didn't mention any issues like she said she would if she was concerned! :)

question: Any ladies measuring ahead I was told at my app yesterday baba is measuring 4 weeks ahead, suddenly he's jumped from 28weeks to 32weeks,gestial diabetes came back 100%, he's been measuring spot on the whole time, they are sending me to a consultant for an extra scan next week ....is this something to be worried about ?
title: measuring ahead ?
